content.title: Apixaban in Vascular Disease
content.description: Direct oral anticoagulant (DOAC) with direct factor Xa inhibition, preferred DOAC for VTE treatment due to favorable bleeding profile.
content.mechanism: Direct competitive inhibition of factor Xa (free and clot-bound)

dosing.afib: 5mg BID (2.5mg BID if ≥2 of: age ≥80, weight ≤60kg, Cr ≥1.5)

advantages.bleeding: Lowest major bleeding among DOACs in ARISTOTLE

perioperative_management.restart: 24-72 hours after, based on bleeding risk
